name: Getting Grounded
description:
The moon exploded while you were en route - You gotta use the debris and your Hook Launcher to get back down to Earth!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Camera control
  • Left Click - Grappling hook
  • Space - Jump/Wallrun
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Left Ctrl - Airbrake
  • R - Reset

Premade Assets

UE4 Starter Content

Wallrunning based on guide created by Matthew Palaje - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqPKRjVm36xmxu1OiegTWWg

Image of the Earth 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:The_Earth_seen_from_Apollo_17.jpg

Image of the Moon
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:FullMoon2010.jpg

Font
Bauhaus 93

Space Skybox Generator
http://wwwtyro.github.io/space-3d

 

SOUNDLY SOUNDS-

  • Fire, Small Flame, Blow Out
  • Gas Leak, Medium Burst 1
  • Tools, Air Compressor, Fast Trigger, Hit, Double, Short, With Tail
